idea-plugin.name: Arduino Support
idea-plugin.description:
Issues Plugin Source

Integrates Arduino CMake into the CLion IDE.

Adds New Project wizard types with options to select board type, cpu, programmer and port:

  • Arduino Sketch
  • Arduino Library
Adds New File Action: New Arduino Sketch

This plugin is a branch of rjuang/CLionArduinoPlugin which in turn is a branch of Original CLionArduinoPlugin written by Francois Cambell.
